title: UpdatePartnershipPricing
description: Request body for updating price overrides on a partnership. All fields are optional to support partial updates. Omitting a field leaves the existing override unchanged. Explicitly setting a field to null clears the override.

pack_price_override.description: Custom price override for the validated sponsoring pack, in the same unit as the catalogue price. Omit to keep existing override. Set to null to clear the override. Set to 0 for a complimentary pack.

options_price_overrides.description: List of price overrides for specific options. Only listed option IDs are affected. Option IDs not listed are left unchanged.

id.description: UUID of the option to override. Must belong to this partnership.

price_override.description: Custom price override for this option. Set to null to clear the override.
